title: Disney Font, Maybe?
author: Starbrand

comments.content:
MOUSE MEET is perhaps Mickey [http://www.dafont.com/mickey.font?text=MOUSEMEET](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826072754/http:/www.dafont.com/mickey.font?text=MOUSEMEET "http://www.dafont.com/mickey.font?text=MOUSEMEET") slanted right.  
Don

Mouse Meet is actually a font called minnie, I'm looking for the font that used for the PACIFIC NORTHWEST part of the designs.

Thanks Though!
